system:
note description: "Summary description for {../tracker/command.xmlCOMMAND}." author: "" date: "$Date$" revision: "$Revision$"
deferred class ../tracker/command.xmlCOMMAND
feature -- Attributes
f_track../tracker/command.xml#f_tracktrack: ../tracker/tracker.xmlTRACKER
f_msg../tracker/command.xml#f_msgmsg: FalseSTRING_8
f_state../tracker/command.xml#f_statestate: FalseINTEGER_32
f_m_a../tracker/command.xml#f_m_am_a: ../tracker/messages_access.xmlMESSAGES_ACCESS
feature
f_execute../tracker/command.xml#f_executeexecute deferred end
f_undo../tracker/command.xml#f_undoundo deferred end
f_redo../tracker/command.xml#f_redoredo deferred end
f_set_state../tracker/command.xml#f_set_stateset_state local tracker_access: ../tracker/tracker_access.xmlTRACKER_ACCESS do if attached ../tracker/command.xml#f_tracktrack as t then t.../tracker/tracker.xml#f_set_cursor_stateset_cursor_state (../tracker/command.xml#f_statestate) else ../tracker/command.xml#f_tracktrack := tracker_access.../tracker/tracker_access.xml#f_mM ../tracker/command.xml#f_tracktrack.../tracker/tracker.xml#f_set_cursor_stateset_cursor_state (0) end end
end -- class ../tracker/command.xmlCOMMAND
